titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service in honor of Marjory Stoneman Douglas, and that the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that such a stamp be issued.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/21/2003--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that a postage stamp should be issued to honor Marjory Stoneman Douglas (first president of the Business and Professional League and author of "The Everglades: River of Grass").
